title: Dinner Rolls
steps: Dissolve yeast in warm milk with pinch sugar. Let sit 5 minutes.
Add sugar, butter, eggs. Mix well.
Add flour and salt. Knead until smooth and elastic, 8-10 minutes.
Place in greased bowl. Cover, let rise until doubled, 1 hour.
Punch down. Divide into 16 pieces. Roll into balls.
Place in greased 9x13 pan. Cover, let rise 30 minutes.
notes: Butter while hot so it soaks in.
